name: Citybuilder Wishes (AI Jam Build)
description:
Break some citybuildin' rules and let your little NPCs run freely... and potentially suffer the consequences. >_>  <_<

Solo project built in 7 days for the AI Jam! I reused an old cobblestone texture I'd made for an older jam, but everything else is brand new, baby! Just a hint - you only get money if you have at least one person working on a Tree (Logger).

Controls:

Play Mode:

  • WASD to move camera/3rd person controller
  • Q/E rotates the camera (re-center with Back To Town button)
  • Shift to run (3rd person only)
  • Enter character with "Fulfill Wish" button
  • Left-Click NPC and Right-Click Farm or Tree to gather from it.

Build Mode:

  • Left-click a building and hit DEL to delete it.
  • Right-click to get rid of a building cursor.

All:

  • 'ESC' exits the game! So be careful when you click it, haha.
  • 'R' resets the game to new

___________

BUGS:

  • NPCs and buildings are selecting, they're just not showing it (gonna fix this soon!)

___________

Genre: Sim/Citybuilder/Exploration

  • Credits: Alice Font by The Alice Project Authors

CHANGELOG (woooooot bugfixing!!!!! :D):

  • Fixed broken food counter so people can actually survive now! :D
  • Build cursor now disappears in play mode.
  • New recruits can talk again, huzzah!!!
  • Fixed wonky NPC pivots if they got thrown off from parent object.
  • Fixed money counter.

Note: Character stats aren't useable on the frontend, yet, so you can't actually fulfill any wishes but you can recruit more people!
